member.name: T:PhysicsTestbed.Testbed
member.summary: Displays information about the current testbed Scene and provides sandbox functionality, such as dragging objects via mouse cursor, etc.

member.name: P:PhysicsTestbed.Testbed.Name
member.summary: [GET / SET] The current Testbed's name. May be formatted.

member.name: P:PhysicsTestbed.Testbed.Description
member.summary: [GET / SET] The current Testbed's description. May be formatted.

member.name: T:PhysicsTestbed.Trigger
member.summary: A simple Component that reacts to collisions.

member.name: P:PhysicsTestbed.Trigger.Triggered
member.summary: [GET] Returns whether or not the Trigger is currently triggered.

member.name: P:PhysicsTestbed.Trigger.SensorsOnly
member.summary: [GET / SET] Specifies whether the Trigger reacty only to its own sensor shapes.

member.name: T:PhysicsTestbed.TriggerDebugRenderer
member.summary: This component uses a SpriteRenderers ColorTint to display the state of a Trigger.
